abilities.name: Recover Mechanism
abilities.text: When you attach an Energy card from your hand to Regigigas, remove all Special Conditions from Regigigas.

attacks.name: Gigaton Punch
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage and does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
